resources.string: Hi! My name is Atul Vidyarthi studying at Indian Institute of Information Technolgy,Sricity ,Chitoor,Andhra Pradesh pursuing B.Tech in Computer Science.It is my first android online course and I never imagined that I would enjoy it this much.My hearty thanks to Internshala for helping me do this.I learnt a lot of thing and so I am happy that I joined this.
